channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Pentagon chief loses bid to reject 9/11 plea deals
item.description: A military appeals court has ruled against Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin’s effort to throw out the plea deals reached for Khalid Sheikh Mohammed and two other defendants in the 9/11 attacks.

item.title: Jimmy Carter is being mourned in his tiny hometown and around the world
Jimmy Carter: Many evolutions for a centenarian ‘citizen of the world’
